events.name: Marcus Vane
events.final_email:
DRAFT — DO NOT SEND

Marcus, your recent Valencia plant expansion suggests a focus on operational efficiency.

Lyophilization often constrains parenteral drug throughput. Our controlled nucleation technology reduced primary drying times by 25% for a client with similar scale—without altering cake quality or reconstitution. This directly increased their annual output by 18%.

If this aligns with your priorities, I can share the case study. No obligation; only data.

Disclaimer: Results may vary based on process parameters. SteriTech does not make regulatory or medical claims.

Let me know if you’d prefer I remove you from future correspondence.

---

events.name: Sarah Jenkins
events.final_email:
DRAFT — DO NOT SEND

Sarah, congratulations on your Series A close last month—€8M is a strong signal of confidence in your pipeline.

SteriTech has provided sterile containment and filling solutions for 40 years, primarily to pharma and biotech firms scaling from clinical to commercial. Given your recent funding, you may now face decisions on aseptic processing that were previously deferred.

If your team is evaluating containment strategies, I can share case studies from similar Series A-stage companies. No obligation—only data.

To proceed, reply with a convenient time for a 15-minute call.

Francesco Rossi
CEO, SteriTech Solutions SL
Valencia, Spain

*No regulatory or medical claims are made. All data is historical and non-binding.*

events.name: Sarah Jenkins
events.final_email:
DRAFT — DO NOT SEND

Sarah, congratulations on closing your €8M Series A last month—timing capital with growth is never trivial.

SteriTech’s containment systems were designed for scale-ups like yours: 40 years of sterile filling experience, family-owned, and built to integrate with existing lines without revalidation delays. If your team is evaluating partners for aseptic processing, I can share case studies from similar Series A-backed firms in Europe.

A 15-minute call next week would allow us to align on your technical requirements. Let me know a time that suits you.

No claims are made regarding regulatory compliance or clinical outcomes.
